name: Live Meeting Connection File
summary: Learn about .RTC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When joining a meeting, a Web browsers may ask a user to download a launch.rtc file, which prevents the meeting from being joined. To fix this issue, use one of the following steps:
Disable the Internet Explorer "Do Not Save Encrypted pages to disk" option at the following menu location: Tools → Internet Options → Advanced → Security.
Re-associate the RTC file type with Live Meeting.

description: File used by Microsoft Office Live Meeting, a program used for online collaborations and meetings; contains link information to join or begin a meeting; commonly found with the name launch.rtc.
